text: Mandy Moore and Taylor Goldsmith married in an intimate boho - style backyard ceremony at her Los Angeles home on Sunday evening. The This Is Us star, 34, and the musician, 33, tied the knot at sunset in front of just 50 guests, including Mandy's co - stars Milo Ventimiglia and Chrissy Metz, three years after meeting on Instagram. The actress is said to have arranged'very boho'nuptials with'rugs on the floor surrounding the altar'and a selection of'beautiful'floral arrangements.
